Name: Commander Pixel
Description: Commander Pixel is a revered member of the WebtrES club, known for his striking shiny black exterior and his unwavering soldier-like discipline. With buttons that have seen numerous virtual battles and a classic screen that displays his tactical prowess, he leads his digital comrades with his arms firmly at his sides, symbolizing his readiness for action. Despite his stern appearance, Commander Pixel has a soft spot for 8-bit melodies and spends his downtime programming nostalgic tunes to inspire his fellow WebtrES members.
